verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: welcomed] [ARG1: Josh Holt , an American who had been held as a prisoner in Venezuela since the summer of 2016 ,] [ARG2: back to the US] [ARGM-TMP: on Saturday night] .
President Donald Trump welcomed Josh Holt , an American who [V: had] been held as a prisoner in Venezuela since the summer of 2016 , back to the US on Saturday night .
